support.title: Help & Support

welcome.title: üëã How can we help you?
welcome.text: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team.

actions.emailDescription: Get personalized help from our support team
actions.websiteDescription: Browse our complete help center and tutorials

q1.question: How accurate is the AI skin analysis?
q1.answer: Our AI skin analysis uses advanced computer vision algorithms trained on thousands of dermatologist-validated images. While highly accurate, it should be used as a guide and not replace professional dermatological advice.

q2.question: How often should I take a new skin analysis?
q2.answer: We recommend taking a new analysis every 4-6 weeks to track your progress. Your skin changes with seasons, products, and time, so regular analysis helps keep your routine optimized.

q3.question: Why am I not seeing results from my routine?
q3.answer: Skincare results typically take 6-12 weeks to become visible. Ensure you're following your routine consistently and using products as directed. If concerns persist, consider consulting a dermatologist.

q4.question: Can I use my own products instead of recommendations?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Our routine builder focuses on ingredients and steps. You can substitute recommended products with similar ones you already own or prefer.

q5.question: How do I cancel my account?
q5.answer: You can delete your account through the Profile > Privacy Policy section, or contact our support team. All your data will be permanently removed within 30 days.

q6.question: Is my skin photo data secure?
q6.answer: Yes, your photos are encrypted and processed securely. We never share personal data with third parties. Photos are automatically deleted after analysis unless you choose to save them for progress tracking.

support.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help!
